Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh team director Khaled Mahmud Sujon has taken up Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka over his comments on the Bangladeshi bowling attack.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both team were terrible against Afghanistan, with Sri Lanka unable to handle the early swing of Fazalhaq Farooqi, and Bangladesh losing their first six wickets to Afghanistan spin duo Mujeeb Ur Rahman and Rashid Khan.
Others: Sri Lanka will hope to launch Wanindu Hasaranga on Bangladesh, who have exhibited weakness vs leg-spin.
